summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of The Alley in Block 1, Madison Street Cable-Railway Addition, being the alley in the block bounded by 32nd Avenue North, East Highland Drive, 33rd Avenue North and East Madison Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 17958 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment of Bonds".
